description_card.subtitle: I'm a full stack engineer that loves building delightful and dependable products!
description_card.resume_1: I am a seasoned Software Developer Specialist with over 8 years of experience in the field, currently contributing my expertise to Encora Inc. as a Full Stack Developer. In my current role, I work remotely from Campinas, SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil, engaging in diverse projects predominantly based in the United States. My responsibilities span various domains such as cloud communication and facilities management.
description_card.resume_encora_details: Working on projects for U.S.-based clients in areas like cloud communication and facilities management. Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS, SCSS/SASS, and various databases including Oracle, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Amazon Aurora. Experienced with frameworks such as Angular (712), Node.js (1016), AngularJS, jQuery, VueJS, and React. Well-versed in Web Service RESTful and Web Service SOAP architectures. Familiar with TDD methodologies using Jest, RTL, and Enzyme. Skilled in estimation of story points, team collaboration, and analysis of epic branches. Proficient in Scrum methodologies.
description_card.resume_sonda_details: Contributed for 3 years and 4 months, specializing in JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, Angular Material, Oracle, MongoDB, and various frameworks. Possesses expertise in Web Service RESTful and Web Service SOAP architectures. Extensive knowledge in debugging tools and frameworks such as Apache Struts, EJB, JMS, Jax-RS, Jboss EAP 7.1, Jboss EAP 6.2. Worked with Visual Studio, Eclipse, Android Studio, Git, and SVN. Operated on Windows and Linux platforms. Managed projects with Scrum, Cascata, CMMI, and PMI methodologies
description_card.resume_project_manager_details: Managed projects as both an Analyst and Project Manager. Led projects in Mobility (Client-Side/Server-Side) and integration solutions in WS. Applied PMBOK knowledge areas and PMI best practices, utilizing the CMMI level III documentation process.
description_card.resume_analyst_details: Worked as a Project Manager in Road Maps and projects for clients in the Mobility sector. Responsible for requirements gathering, scope definition, project planning, prototype development, test execution, and project monitoring and closure. Applied CMMI certification and PMBOK methodology. Supported product development, clients, and production. Conducted prospecting for product improvements and research for new technologies. Collaborated with contractors like Akitabox, VMWare, and IDEMIA.
description_card.resume_skills: Proficient in Agile methodologies. Certified Project Manager with expertise in PMBOK and CMMI processes. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and collaboration abilities. Adept at managing projects from conception to delivery.
description_card.resume_2: I am passionate about leveraging my skills to contribute to innovative projects and deliver impactful solutions. Let's connect and explore new possibilities!
